books.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin

chapters.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1

verses.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1:1
verses.text: Reply of the Blessed Virgin to this Letter.

verses.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1:2
verses.text: The lowly handmaid of Christ Jesus to Ignatius, her beloved fellow-disciple.

verses.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1:3
verses.text: The things which thou hast heard and learned from John concerning Jesus are true.

verses.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1:4
verses.text: Believe them, cling to them, and hold fast the profession of that Christianity which thou hast embraced, and conform thy habits and life to thy profession.

verses.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1:5
verses.text: Now I will come in company with John to visit thee, and those that are with thee.

verses.name: Ignatius: Reply of the Blessed Virgin 1:6
verses.text: Stand fast in the faith, and show thyself a man; nor let the fierceness of persecution move thee, but let thy spirit be strong and rejoice in God thy Saviour, Amen.
